headline: Rockwell Automation and Microsoft Deliver on a Shared Vision to Accelerate Industrial Transformation
summary: MILWAUKEE, November 19, 2024--Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, and Microsoft Corp., a leading global technology company, are proud to announce an expanded strategic collaboration aimed at revolutionizing industrial transformation. Together, the companies will provide manufacturing customers with advanced cloud and AI solutions that deliver powerful data insights, streamline operations and enhance sca
